leads.lead_text: Leaves oblanceolate; pinnatisect leaves with broadly oblong-elliptic to obovate segments, terminal lobe much larger than laterals
Leaves linear; pinnatisect leaves, if present, with more or less linear segments, terminal lobe similar to laterals
